MSP Data Tool Developer Guide
=============================

Development module is MSPUsersDev

User module is MSPUsers

Independent tests of user module MSPUsersOtherPc

Released to user is MSPUsersDataTool



Post-development:
Install packaging tools: pip install --upgrade setuptools packaging

Run unit tests: 
Compilation in cmd within Development folder: python -m compileall .     or "python -m compileall MSPUsersDev/utils" from outside folder
Build package by running setup: python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
Copy the following folders to MSPUserDataTool
   .ipynb_checkpoints
   __pycache__
   certificate
   .env
   userConfig
   userProgram
   utils-1.0.0


Tests:
Test specific util module: eg auth_token.py
Test script: cd MSPUserTests  then python -m unittest test_utils.py

Running in user accessed folder:
Installation: pip install utils-1.0.0-py3-none-any.whl
!pip install utils-1.0.1-py3-none-any.whl --force-reinstall

User Imports
jwt python-dotenv pandas

Analytics server:
sudo adduser dataanalysis
passwd:  analysis2024

sudo pip install jupyterlab
jupyter lab --version






Docker config in online server:
 1187  docker --version
 1188  sudo su
 1189  sudp apt update
 1190  sudo apt update
 1191  sudo apt install -y docker.io docker-compise
 1192  sudo apt install -y docker.io docker-compose
 1193  sudo apt-get update --fix-missing
 1194  sudo apt-get install -f
 1195  sudo dpkg --configure -a
 1196  sudo apt-get clean
 1197  sudo apt-get autoremove
 1198  sudo apt-get remove -y docker docker-engine docker.io containerd runc
 1199  sudo apt-get update
 1200  sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg
 1201  sudo apt-get update
 1202  sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
 1203  sudo curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/latest/download/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
 1204  sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
 1205  docker --version
 1206  docker-compose --version
 1207  sudo systemctl start docker
 1208  sudo systemctl enable docker
 1209  sudo docker run hello-world
 1210  vi docker-compose.yml
 1211  sudo docker-compose up
 1212  history
